activities: Collection, processing and analysis of voice telephone call data (such as extension number making a call, number dialed, date, time and facility) from corporate telephone systems originating from customer companies in the EU for the purpose of network optimization, corporate chargeback and management.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: A PII Participant may refer a privacy issue to John Perri, President of Comview, at Comview Corporation, 110 Walt Whitman Road, Suite 101, Huntington Station, NY USA 11746.  Mr. Perri's phone number is (631) 935-1901, fax number is (631) 935-1925 and his e-mail address is jp@comviewcorp.com. All Comview employees will be required to be familiar with and adhere to this privacy policy. Comview will investigate any reported complaints of violations of its privacy policy and will take prompt remedial action where violations are found. If a PII Participant is unsatisfied with Comview's resolution of the complaint, then Comview or the PII Participant may file a request for mediation of a privacy issue with the American Arbitration Association (AAA), ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program at 335 Madison Avenue, 10th Floor, New York, NY 10017-4605, USA; telephone: (212) 716-5800; fax: (212) 716-5905 and e-mail: websitemail@adr.org.
